darkhistory.electrons.ics.engloss_diff_terms.F0_up_down_sum¶

darkhistory.electrons.ics.engloss_diff_terms.F0_up_down_sum(beta, delta, T, as_pairs=False)¶

Computes the F0_upscatter + F0_downscatter term.

This term is used in the small parameter expansion method for computing the ICS energy loss spectrum.

Parameters:
  • beta (ndarray) – Velocity of the electron.
  • delta (ndarray) – Energy gained from upscattering by the secondary photon.
  • T (float) – CMB temperature
  • as_pairs (bool, optional) – If true, treats eleceng and photeng as a paired list: produces eleceng.size == photeng.size values. Otherwise, gets the spectrum at each photeng for each eleceng, returning an array of length eleceng.size*photeng.size.
Returns:

The F0_upscatter + F0_downscatter term.
Return type:

ndarray
